verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:6
verses.text: Yea, though he live a thousand years twice told, yet hath he seen no good: do not all go to one place?

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:7
verses.text: All the labour of man is for his mouth, and yet the appetite is not filled.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:8
verses.text: For what hath the wise more than the fool? what hath the poor, that knoweth to walk before the living?

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 6:9
verses.text: Better is the sight of the eyes than the wandering of the desire: this is also vanity and vexation of spirit.
